lead_paragraph: Readers discuss a column by Thomas L. Friedman in which he says the decade spent fighting terrorism in the Mideast has been “a waste.”

headline.main: What the U.S. Can and Can’t Do in a Violent Mideast
headline.print_headline: What the U.S. Can and Can’t Do in a Violent Mideast
